trans-unit.source: Defines the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.
Gets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> property does not report document type definition (DTD) defaults

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during schema validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value for this validated XML node is nil; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.
The MemberType property is set only if the static type of the XML node is a union type in which case the MemberType property will return the type from the union the XML node validated against.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> object that represents the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.
Gets the compiled <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref> that corresponds to this validated XML node.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref> that corresponds to this validated XML node.
Gets the compiled <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> that corresponds to this validated XML node.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> that corresponds to this validated XML node.
Gets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.
The static type of an XML node is the type that was declared in the XSD schema.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> of this validated XML node.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity"></xref> value of this validated XML node.

The possible <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity> values for this XML node are <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity"></xref> value of this validated XML node.
